heading: growing a nordic amazon
subheading: boxman.com is hoping to capture the european net music market and stave off international competitors. the company wants to leverage its 11 affiliates into a robust ipo.
author: reuters
text: the latest rock album has just been released and crowds of people around the world are rushing to buy it. but not to ordinary music stores. they're about to go shopping over the internet.read wired news' ongoing mp3 coverage
